name: Doomed Mapancho
description:
A simple game that i made for some friends, it's a crossover of Doomies and "Home Steal Rythm Home" made by Axolotl Bros

You're controlling Mapancho, and your mission is to steal things from other houses without being detected.

Not much to say, hope you enjoy it!

Controls:

UpInteract/Move Up/JumpLeft/Right KeysMove

That's all.
